mapper.update: update owner_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idnumber = #{idnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isadmin = #{isadmin,jdbcType=BIT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select uid, name, gender, phone, email, idnumber, birthday, isadmin, description from owner_info
